name: King Pin
description:
In King Pin, you play as a mercenary for the titular Kingpin. You are valued higher than the rest due to your jetpack, so it is your job to swindle kerp from other bosses by breaking in to their compounds from the roof under the shroud of night. Don't get caught, and don't come back empty handed. Get harvesting.

Controls:

 - WASD to move
 - Double jump to fly
 - Mouse and WASD to navigate flight
 - E to interact
